title: Talk about the NURF MODE
body:
Yes. So good that this mode is friendly to the old people. My grandma（68） can't wait to play this mode and according to the video on the internet. They got 2 new items 1 is doran stick/rod? which look like the wukong'e Q and it gain 1 AD and 1AP per mins with no max limit and also u can have 6 doran sticks/rods......Yes  have 6 daron rods and have this game not ended in 2 hours is a good idea. And another item whih has no AD/AP but can reset all ur skills' cd. I dont think this one is useful if the cooldown of this item also +200% and has no AD/AP.

**YES I LIKE URF AND MY GRANDMA LIE NURF PLZ HAVE 2 MODES TOGETHER
I DONT WANT TO PLAY A LAGGING GAME WITH MY LAGGING COMPUTER CONNECTING TO A LAGGING INTERNET WITH LAGGING GRANDMA...**
